cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tashizan

sentence.kanji: 娘は学校で足し算を習った。
sentence.romaji: musume ha gakou de tashizan wo narata
sentence.english: My daughter learned addition in school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuugakou

sentence.kanji: 息子の中学校は家から5分です。
sentence.romaji: musuko no chuugakou ha ie kara gofun desu
sentence.english: My son's junior high is five minutes from our house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakamono

sentence.kanji: 最近の若者は本を読まない。
sentence.romaji: saikin no wakamono ha hon wo yomanai
sentence.english: Young people these days don't read books.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouiku

sentence.kanji: 彼は海外で教育を受けました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaigai de kyouiku wo ukemashita
sentence.english: He received his education abroad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirusugi

sentence.kanji: 彼は昼過ぎに来ます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hirusugi ni kimasu
sentence.english: He'll come after lunch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoukai

sentence.kanji: 私たちは教会で結婚式をしました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha kyoukai de kekonshiki wo shimashita
sentence.english: We had our wedding in a church.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoukasho

sentence.kanji: 日本語の教科書を忘れた。
sentence.romaji: nihongo no kyoukasho wo wasureta
sentence.english: I forgot my Japanese textbook.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisha

sentence.kanji: 彼は新聞記者です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinbun kisha desu
sentence.english: He's a newspaper journalist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutougakou

sentence.kanji: 弟が高等学校を卒業しました。
sentence.romaji: otouto ga koutougakou wo sotsugyou shimashita
sentence.english: My little brother graduated from high school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushou

sentence.kanji: 今、値段を交渉しています。
sentence.romaji: ima nedan wo koushou shite imasu
sentence.english: We're currently negotiating the price.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanri

sentence.kanji: 彼女が私のスケジュールを管理している。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga watashi no sukeju-ru wo kanri shite iru
sentence.english: She manages my schedule.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsusa

sentence.kanji: 今年の夏は暑さが厳しい。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no natsu ha atsusa ga kibishii
sentence.english: The heat this summer is overbearing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokoku

sentence.kanji: 彼はヨーロッパ諸国を旅行した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yo-ropa shokoku wo ryokou shita
sentence.english: He traveled through various European countries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oikosu

sentence.kanji: 大きなトラックが私たちを追い越した。
sentence.romaji: ooki na toraku ga watashitachi wo oikoshita
sentence.english: A big truck overtook us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayamaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は直ぐに謝りました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sugu ni ayamarimashita
sentence.english: He apologized at once.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuusha

sentence.kanji: 彼は注射があまり好きではありません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chuusha ga amari suki de ha arimasen
sentence.english: He's not too fond of getting shots.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokushin

sentence.kanji: 私の兄はまだ独身です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ani ha mada dokushin desu
sentence.english: My big brother's still single.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouka

sentence.kanji: この薬には胃を守る効果がある。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri ni ha i wo mamoru kouka ga aru
sentence.english: This medicine is effective in protecting your stomach.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suberu

sentence.kanji: 彼は雪の上を滑った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuki no ue wo subeta
sentence.english: He slipped on the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hone

sentence.kanji: 彼は足の骨を折りました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ashi no hone wo orimashita
sentence.english: He broke a bone in his foot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoushi

sentence.kanji: 彼は高校教師だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koukou kyoushi da
sentence.english: He's a high school teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouju

sentence.kanji: 彼は化学の教授です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kagaku no kyouju desu
sentence.english: He's a chemistry professor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sashimi

sentence.kanji: 私は刺身は食べません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sashimi ha tabemasen
sentence.english: I don't eat sashimi.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nabe

sentence.kanji: 鍋にスープが入っているよ。
sentence.romaji: nabe ni su-pu ga haite iru yo
sentence.english: There's some soup in the pan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanja

sentence.kanji: 患者は眠っています。
sentence.romaji: kanja ha nemute imasu
sentence.english: The patient is sleeping.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fumu

sentence.kanji: 運転手がブレーキを踏んだ。
sentence.romaji: untenshu ga bure-ki wo funda
sentence.english: The driver stepped on the brake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fumikiri

sentence.kanji: その踏切は長い。
sentence.romaji: sono fumikiri ha nagai
sentence.english: This railroad crossing has a long signal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasu

sentence.kanji: 母は味噌汁に水を足した。
sentence.romaji: haha ha misoshiru ni mizu wo tashita
sentence.english: My mother added water to the miso soup.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashi

sentence.kanji: 箸を上手に使えるよ。
sentence.romaji: hashi wo jouzu ni tsukaeru yo
sentence.english: I'm good at using chopsticks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazeru

sentence.kanji: 私も交ぜてください。
sentence.romaji: watashi mo mazete kudasai
sentence.english: Please include me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teashi

sentence.kanji: あの人は手足が長い。
sentence.romaji: ano hito ha teashi ga nagai
sentence.english: That person has long arms and legs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokou

sentence.kanji: あの国とは国交がない。
sentence.romaji: ano kuni to ha kokou ga nai
sentence.english: There are no diplomatic relations with that country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majiwaru

sentence.kanji: 二つの国道はここで交わります。
sentence.romaji: futatsu no kokudou ha koko de majiwarimasu
sentence.english: Two national roads intersect here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusoku

sentence.kanji: 今年はひどい水不足よ。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha hidoi mizubusoku yo
sentence.english: There's a severe drought this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majiwaru

sentence.kanji: 人と交わって、多くのことを学びました。
sentence.romaji: hito to majiwate ooku no koto wo manabimashita
sentence.english: I learned a lot of things by socializing with people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kirisutokyou

sentence.kanji: この先にキリスト教の教会があります。
sentence.romaji: kono saki ni kirisutokyou no kyoukai ga arimasu
sentence.english: There is a Christian church ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazaru

sentence.kanji: 大人も子供も交ざって遊んだの。
sentence.romaji: otona mo kodomo mo mazate asonda no
sentence.english: Adults and children played together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukei

sentence.kanji: 父兄の方々はこちらへどうぞ。
sentence.romaji: fukei no katagata ha kochira he douzo
sentence.english: This way please, parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hokoushatengoku

sentence.kanji: 日曜日はこの通りが歩行者天国になります。
sentence.romaji: nichiyoubi ha kono toori ga hokoushatengoku ni narimasu
sentence.english: This street is turned into a vehicle-free promenade on Sundays.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mono

sentence.kanji: 私は先ほど電話した者です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sakihodo denwa shita mono desu
sentence.english: I'm the person who called a while earlier.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakusha

sentence.kanji: 彼は作家であり学者です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saka de ari gakusha desu
sentence.english: He is a writer and a scholar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouin

sentence.kanji: 彼は高校の教員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koukou no kyouin desu
sentence.english: He's a high school teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majiru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は外国人に交じってダンスをしたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha gaikokujin ni majite dansu wo shita no
sentence.english: She mingled with foreigners as she danced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manzoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は結果に満足したようです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha keka ni manzoku shita you desu
sentence.english: He seems to be satisfied with the result.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiku

sentence.kanji: この薬はあまりよく効かないよ。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri ha amari yoku kikanai yo
sentence.english: This medicine doesn't work very well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouryoku

sentence.kanji: その薬は効力が強いよ。
sentence.romaji: sono kusuri ha kouryoku ga tsuyoi yo
sentence.english: The effect of the medicine is strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's イスラムkyou

sentence.kanji: これはイスラム教の寺院です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha isuramukyou no jiin desu
sentence.english: This is a mosque.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagakusha

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても有名な科学者だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo yuumei na kagakusha da
sentence.english: He is a very famous scientist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisha

sentence.kanji: その事故で30人の死者が出たの。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de sanjuunin no shisha ga deta no
sentence.english: Thirty people died due to the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ensoku

sentence.kanji: 明日は遠足で動物園に行きます。
sentence.romaji: asu ha ensoku de doubutsuen ni ikimasu
sentence.english: Tomorrow we're going to the zoo on a school trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugosu

sentence.kanji: 夏休みを高原で過ごしました。
sentence.romaji: natsuyasumi wo kougen de sugoshimashita
sentence.english: I spent the summer vacation in the highlands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fubo

sentence.kanji: 学校から父母に連絡があったんだ。
sentence.romaji: gakou kara fubo ni renraku ga ata n da
sentence.english: My parents were contacted by the school.
